description: In this course, you will build a simple browser-based application that accesses your camera and applies Instagram-like filters to photos or video streams in real time. Along the way, you will explore how JetBrains Junie can simplify everyday web development by building out-of-the-box modules.
title: Real-Time Camera Filter App (Junie)
short_description: Build a simple frontend app to explore JetBrains Junie’s generative power
